utf.org.castor.ddl
Class BaseGeneratorTest

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          utf.org.castor.ddl.BaseGeneratorTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
Direct Known Subclasses:
Db2GeneratorTest, DerbyGeneratorTest, HsqlGeneratorTest, MssqlGeneratorTest, MysqlGeneratorTest, OracleGeneratorTest, PointBaseGeneratorTest, PostgresqlGeneratorTest, SapdbGeneratorTest, SybaseGeneratorTest
public abstract class BaseGeneratorTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

This class handles all testcase for all database. The specific database will inherite this class. Expecting that all testcase use the same scenarios for all database. The expected result maybe differ within each other. The _engine defines which expected result will be loaded to the testcase. The inherited class may redefine this variable to reuse the test scenarios, but _engine.
Created on Jun 13, 2006 - 6:15:36 PM

Author:
Le Duc Bao
